tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence_feed (
  feed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feed_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  feed_url TEXT NOT NULL,
  threat_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  threat_level ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high') NOT NULL,
  update_frequency INT
);

CREATE TABLE indicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    indicator_value VARCHAR(255),
    indicator_description TEXT,
    feed_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (feed_id) REFERENCES threat_intelligence_feeds(feed_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_description TEXT,
    indicator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (indicator_id) REFERENCES indicators(indicator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE detected_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id INT,
    detection_time TIMESTAMP,
    detection_method VARCHAR(100),
    threat_level VARCHAR(50)
);
